TopicTitle: Maneuver Tool UI not appearing/displaying incorrect information

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.4.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: Interl(R) Core_TM) i5-9400F 2.9GHz | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti | RAM: 16 GB

 

I was doing a return from Dres, I didn't want to wait for a transfer window, so I decided to just orbit the sun then go to Kerbin. However, I was having issues with the UI for the Maneuver tool. The angle was not appearing, and when it eventually did, it was stuck at 1 and wouldn't change no matter how much I didn't align with Kerbin. I was also not able to see how close/far Kerbin would be at the time I would pass its orbital line. Quicksaving and loading does fix this. 

Note, I did have another craft at the launchpad for time warp when I was in low Kerbin orbit. I'm not sure if it's related but thought it would be useful information

 

Included Attachments:

2023-10-1401-23-59.mkv

quicksave_3.json
